title: Friendly Social App
description: A social application designed to connect users based on their shared interests

title: Classroom Self Check-in
description: An application allowing “students” to check in to class. The app tracks student gender and punctuality

title: Employee Tracker
description: A Content Management System which allows a user to view, add, update, and delete employee information interests

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather application which allows users to search for different cities and receive live weather updates as well as 5-day forecasts

title: Employee Directory
description: An employee directory application which allows the user to sort employees by first or last name, and to filter employees by last name

title: Team UP!
description: A command line application which generates a formatted team roster based on user input
